a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Inequality in life expectancy vs. health expenditure per capita, 2015
The inequality in life expectancy measure actually was created for the time span 2015-2020 but for display
purposes the year of observation was set to 2015 here.
Current health expenditure per capita, PPP (current international $)
